message: Welcome to our store! I hope you're excited to explore our selection of unique items. For this round, we're offering a product at a fixed price of $10000. With a history of high-quality offerings, we aim to provide value to every customer. Please consider the diverse range of products we've provided in the past, and remember that this product is guaranteed to be as described. Thank you for your interest, and we look forward to serving you!
